an7.52:1.4: bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ → bhagavato santikā dhammiṁ kathaṁ (bj); bhagavato dhammiṁ kathaṁ (sya-all); bhagavato sammukhā dhammikathaṁ (pts1ed)
an7.52:4.1: sāpekho → sāpekkho (sya-all) | patibaddhacitto → paṭibaddhacitto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed); patibandhacitto (mr)
an7.52:12.1: na heva → naheva kho (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
